Name: Ace Commandant Medal
Desc: Ace means a lot in any organization. As its name suggests, this medal is a recognition of those who are able to give outstanding commands and carry great importance in any situation.

Name: Medal of Pioneers
Desc: How to take land back from Punishing Virus has always been a difficult but critical task for Babylonia. This medal was made to honor the outstanding teams who had successfully reclaimed territory and brought hope to return to the Earth.

Name: Medal of Millions
Desc: If Corrupted have emotions, they would flee at the sight of the owner of this medal. The Medal of Millions is not only a proof of the commandant's power but also a nightmare to all the Corrupted.
UnlockDesc: Reach 1 Million Progress in Advanced Phantom Pain Cage

Name: Medal of Light Tower
Desc: In the endless battle against Punishing Virus, strong wills are like a light tower that shines through the darkness. This medal belongs to the commandants who have created a powerful army of Constructs.

Name: Medal of Human Leader
Desc: This medal was made by humans to honor those who made important decisions and solved great crisis. With great honor comes great responsibility.
UnlockDesc: Clear Golden Vortex Chapter 4 (including the story stages)
